metadata.Title: STEMP (Soil Temperature) module
metadata.Institution: DSSAT, University of Florida (IFAS) and collaborators
metadata.Extended description: STEMP computes daily soil temperature by layer using a sinusoidal annual forcing around an average annual soil temperature (TAV) with amplitude (TAMP). Thermal damping depth depends on bulk density and soil water status, and a 5â€‘day moving average of recent temperatures adjusts the surface forcing. The module provides surface temperature and soil temperatures at the midpoint of each soil layer.
